entity.name: Scientists across the globe race the clock to develop coronavirus vaccine
entity.description: A team of infectious disease researchers at the University of Hong Kong claimed on Tuesday to have already finished developing a vaccine to treat the virus, but say "it will take a long time to test on animals" before it can be given to humans. As the clock ticks on and more people are infected, scientists worldwide are rushing to get any sort of experimental vaccine ready for human trial.

text: @ddale8 IDEA:  Use Trump as a drug test subject for coronavirus exposure and cure.
